page.title: 02A school child's morning.
page.content: A typical day for me would start when mammy calls me at 8.00am.I don't get up until 8.30am.I dress usually in jeans as our school does not have a uniform.I go up to the kitchen for a cup of tea.We get the school bus at the bottom of the lane at 8.50am.I always save a place for my two friends Ciara and Rita at the back of the bus. When we reach the school at 9.15am we go out to the toilets to have a chat for a few minutes with our other two friends Geraldine and Agnes. When we go into class we say prayers and have Religion.We usually do Maths and English and sometimes Workcards. We have our two course lunch from 12.15pm to 12.40pm in the school dining hall and have playtime until 12.55pm.
